title: 21.8GB of Avatar Goodness
description:
***SORRY FOR ALL WHO TRIED THIS PREVIOUSLY. MY UPLOAD SPEEDS ARE SLOW, SO I'VE TAKEN A DIFFERENT APPROACH TO GET MORE SEEDERS FASTER. THE TORRENT IS FULL OF TORRENTS FOR DIFFERENT PARTS. PLEASE DOWNLOAD ONE AT A TIME, THEN SEED. THE FILES ARE TOO BIG TO DO IT ALL IN ONE GO!!***

Actual size: 21.8 GB

Every piece of video and audio related to Avatar: The Last Airbender and Legend of Korra one could possibly need, in the highest quality available.

Contains:
Avatar: The Last Airbender Soundtrack
All 3 seasons of Avatar: The Last Airbender in 720p
3 Chibi shorts
The un-aired pilot of Avatar: The Last Airbender
The Avatar: The Last Airbender animated graphic novel
The Promise: Parts 1 and 2
The first season of Avatar: The Legend of Korra in 720p (some have Nick logos)

I can personally assure you that there are no viruses in any of these files. If commenters can verify this, that would be great.

I just hope I make someones day. Enjoy! Please seed!
